column3: BBC Third Programme]] aired a half-hour radio play of '''''The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth, Beorhthelm's Son''''', after [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem of the [[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth

column2: Rayner Heppenstall]].<ref group="note">Heppenstall wrote to Tolkien asking what "dialect" the speakers should adopt (see [[Letter 152]]).</ref>
